#!/bin/sh

# The CSFs listed within matrixblockXX.f90 are generated by this script.

ORB[0]=""
ORB[1]=1s
ORB[2]=2s,2p
ORB[3]=3s,3p,3d
ORB[4]=4s,4p,4d,4f
ORB[5]=5s,5p,5d,5f
ORB[6]=6s,6p,6d,6f
ORB[7]=7s,7p,7d,7f

rcsfgenerate_symb > outMR.txt 2>&1 <<EOF
0
1s(2,i)2s(2,*)
1s(2,i)2p(2,*)
1s(2,i)2s(1,*)3s(1,*)
1s(2,i)2s(1,*)3d(1,*)
1s(2,i)2p(1,*)3p(1,*)

${ORB[3]}
0,0
0
n
EOF
mv rcsf.out rcsfmr.inp

rcsfgenerate_symb > outEn.txt 2>&1 <<EOF
0
1s(2,i)2s(2,*)
1s(2,i)2p(2,*)
1s(2,i)2s(1,*)3s(1,*)
1s(2,i)2s(1,*)3d(1,*)
1s(2,i)2p(1,*)3p(1,*)

${ORB[3]}
0,0
0
y
1s(2,*)2s(2,*)
1s(2,*)2p(2,*)
1s(2,*)2s(1,*)3s(1,*)
1s(2,*)2s(1,*)3d(1,*)
1s(2,*)2p(1,*)3p(1,*)

${ORB[7]}
0,0
2
n
EOF

mv rcsf.out rcsf.inp
rcsfinteract >> outEn.txt 2>&1 <<EOF
1
EOF
mv rcsf.out ne4_evenEn7.sym
